column4: Hello.  I was hoping for the Gnome drawer applet to be able to hold Windows, so that they disappear from the Window list.  I have some apps that I'm permanently running, and that I don't want to show up in any desktop.
And anyone have an idea how I could start up Jackd before Pulseaudio starts on my Ubuntu?
first google result for your exact question should be helpful: http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-875378.html
